name: plex-prerolls
description: Plex Prerolls is a self-hosted tool to manage and randomize video clips as prerolls in Plex Media Server. It includes custom rules and scheduling through a simple UI.

features.title: Preroll Management
features.description: Organize and manage video clips to play before movies in Plex

features.title: Randomization
features.description: Randomly select prerolls from your collection for variety in each viewing

features.title: Scheduling Rules
features.description: Configure prerolls to play based on date, season, or custom schedules

features.title: Theme Customization
features.description: Create separate preroll collections for different occasions or themes

features.title: Plex Integration
features.description: Automatically update Plex server configuration with selected prerolls

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Manage prerolls through an intuitive web-based control panel

features.title: Preview Playback
features.description: Preview preroll videos before adding them to rotation

features.title: Weight Settings
features.description: Assign probability weights to prerolls for more or less frequent playback
